content: {"locationId": "15750", "organizationId": "12073", "name": "Deliverance Church of God", "address1": "401 1st Ave", "address2": "", "city": "Hampton", "state": "TN", "zipCode": "37658", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "36.2850436", "longitude": "-82.1723568", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "our mission is to be good stewards with what God has blessed us with, that said we wish to feed family's one meal at a time to help stop food deserts in our area and the surrounding area's  of Hampton tn.", "notes": "      Our days and hours of operation has changed we will be in operation the (1) and (3) Tuesdays of every month we hope to operate more often in the  future the entrance is located in the rear of the church at the side door, if you have special needs or if you have food allergies please let us know before we fill your order we are a faith based food pantry but anyone regardless of your beliefs are always welcome we also carry some personal care items while supply's last", "contactName": "Mary Parmer", "contactPhone": "423-725-3267", "contactEmail": "meparmer88@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 91, "regionName": "Second Harvest Food Bank of Northeast Tennessee", "logoBlobNameSmall": "505f16df-c5ff-4c5a-bd3f-232e4517fa5f.png", "website": "https://netfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Monday 3:30 PM-6:30 PM", "Wednesday 3:30 PM-6:30 PM", "Friday 3:30 PM-6:30 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
